verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>

If we attempt to <S%H5254>commune<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H413>with<s%> thee, wilt thou be <S%H3811>grieved?<s%> but <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H6113>withhold<s%> himself from <S%H4405>speaking?<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou hast <S%H3256>instructed<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> and thou hast <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H7504>weak<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
Thy <S%H4405>words<s%> have <S%H6965>upheld<s%> him that was <S%H3782>falling,<s%> and thou hast <S%H553>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3766>feeble<s%> <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> it is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee, and thou <S%H3811>faintest;<s%> it <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H5704><s%> thee, and thou art <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
Is <S%H3808>not<s%> this thy <S%H3374>fear,<s%> thy <S%H3690>confidence,<s%> thy <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and the <S%H8537>uprightness<s%> of thy <S%H1870>ways?<s%>
Remember, <S%H2142><s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> ever <S%H6>perished,<s%> being <S%H5355>innocent?<s%> or <S%H375>where<s%> were the <S%H3477>righteous<s%> cut <S%H3582>off?<s%>
Even <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> they that <S%H2790>plow<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5999>wickedness,<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> the same.
By the <S%H4480>blast<s%> <S%H5397><s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> they <S%H6>perish,<s%> and by the <S%H4480>breath<s%> <S%H7307><s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> are they <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>
The <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of the <S%H738>lion,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the fierce <S%H7826>lion,<s%> and the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions,<s%> are <S%H5421>broken.<s%>
The old <S%H3918>lion<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%> for <S%H4480>lack<s%> <S%H1097><s%> of <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and the stout <S%H3833>lion's<s%> <S%H1121>whelps<s%> are scattered <S%H6504>abroad.<s%>
Now a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was secretly <S%H1589>brought<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, and mine <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> a <S%H8102>little<s%> <S%H4480>thereof.<s%>
In <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> from the <S%H4480>visions<s%> <S%H2384><s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> when deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%>
Fear <S%H6343><s%> came <S%H7122>upon<s%> me, and <S%H7460>trembling,<s%> which made <S%H7230>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> to <S%H6342>shake.<s%>
Then a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H2498>passed<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> my <S%H6440>face;<s%> the <S%H8185>hair<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> stood up: <S%H5568><s%>

It stood <S%H5975>still,<s%> but I could <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> the <S%H4758>form<s%> thereof: an <S%H8544>image<s%> was <S%H5048>before<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> there was <S%H1827>silence,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice,<s%> saying,
Shall mortal <S%H582>man<s%> be more just than <S%H6663>God?<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H433><s%> shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> be more <S%H2891>pure<s%> than his <S%H4480>maker?<s%> <S%H6213><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he put no <S%H539>trust<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and his <S%H4397>angels<s%> he <S%H7760>charged<s%> with folly: <S%H8417><s%>

How much <S%H637>less<s%> in them that dwell <S%H7931>in<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3247>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> which are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6211>moth?<s%>

They are <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> from <S%H4480>morning<s%> <S%H1242><s%> to <S%H6153>evening:<s%> they <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%> without <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H7760>regarding<s%> it.
Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> their <S%H3499>excellency<s%> which is in them go <S%H5265>away?<s%> they <S%H4191>die,<s%> even <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
